## Enabling Analytics

Add your analytics keys in `mint.json` to enable tracking. You can integrate with multiple platforms simultaneously.

```json Analytics Configuration
"analytics": {
    "amplitude": {
        "apiKey": "required"
    },
    "ga4": {
        "measurementId": "required"
    },
    "mixpanel": {
        "projectToken": "required"
    },
    // Additional platforms:
    // clearbit, fathom, gtm, hotjar, koala,
    // logrocket, pirsch, plausible, posthog
}
```

For platform-specific setup instructions, select the relevant integration card above.
